website_summaries.verdict: This rocker helps relieve pain and tightness in your calf, which in turn relieves pain and tightness in everything below it.
pros: Automatically holds the foot in the best position for stretching
Fits up to men's adult shoe size 13
Great for runners and post-surgery recovery
cons: Uncomfortable to use without wearing shoes

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I cannot believe the difference this makes. I've struggled with tendonitis in both Achilles for the past year. I've tried two different custom orthotics (from podiatrist and from chiropractor- a total of about $500), no acetaminophen, tylenol, aleve worked. Taping helps for a bit as well as icing. An ER doc that I work for suggested that I try this. Within two weeks I felt relief. Now its been a couple months and I've only had about two flare-ups, instead of constant pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mik Rhab

customer_reviews.title: ProStretch Blue give super relief to calf, ankle and foot
customer_reviews.text: Got the ProStretch Blue to see if this product works for stretching to relieve plantar fasciitis. It does, and I get super relief on my calf, ankle and foot. Brought the PS Blue to my office so I could stretch throughout the day, and ordered the Prostretch Plus Blue for home (mainly because it is pushed as a premium product. Stick with the basic PS Blue - it is simple, it is better than the PS Plus Blue, and it is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: cbHoo

customer_reviews.title: Finally and end to very frustrating and painful problem.
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with Plantar Factitious for almost a year. Spent literally hundreds of dollars on shoes, inserts, boots that you wear at night to stretch your feet, doctor's appointments, etc. If it said it helped PF I bought it. Ordered this and started using it twice a day and pain is gone in less than a week. I don't know why more doctors aren't aware of this. Finally and end to very frustrating and painful problem.
customer_reviews.author: ice cream man

customer_reviews.title: Has made a huge difference!
customer_reviews.text: I've been hobbling out of bed for the last three months due to a tight Achilles tendon and heal pain. I've found that using this before bed and when I wake up has significantly improved the pain and I no longer wake up so tight and limpy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peltier

customer_reviews.title: Great and deep stretch! Can really feel it.
customer_reviews.text: Great calf stretch. I got the same one as at my Physical Therapist. I wanted the double but $200 was ridiculous. This works just as good. It does help to have a foot up on a step or something so you don't over lean or over stretch it. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Okerholm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have bad Achilles. They hurt after a good workout or run. This nifty tool gets the job done when I need to stretch it out. I have tried so many traditional stretches for my Achilles and this by far works better than any regular stretch I have done. I instantly feel the full stretch along my Achilles and calf muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Wpatton

customer_reviews.title: Must have for runners with tight calves
customer_reviews.text: Oh what a great product. I took up running after many years away and calves were so so tight. A massage therapist recommended this and my calves were screaming as the stretch released the tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with streching the leg and foot in a controlled manner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my teenage son who was complaining about tight calfs. He has used it several times and it has helped stretch out his calf muscle in a controlled manner. We haven’t used all the exercises that the pamphlet had on it but may in the future. I definitely can tell a difference when I use this consistently. I would recommend for anyone who has issues with flexibility in the lower leg and foot.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: This adds another dimension to Achilles streching
customer_reviews.text: I like this product enough I bought this one for my daughter. I have used this exact model with success for many years. Educate yourself on the importance of stretching the Achilles tendon&you will then understand why this device needs to be part of your routine. If plantar fasciitis is a problem, this helps if you're diligent about using it.
customer_reviews.author: S4 Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: Pro Stretch
customer_reviews.text: I came across this at my gym and tried it. I was in heaven. I've tried so many different ways of stretching my calves but never felt like it was a deep enough stretch until I tried this. Yes I've done the stairs and the leaning against a wall but it wasn't the same. Why did I buy one if there's one at my gym? I dance a lot and want to be able to stretch my calves when I'm done dancing, or even between dances. They gym is too far away and often closed when I need a calf stretch. After essentially being on my toes for hours this offers much needed relief.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Think Your Calves Are Stretched? Think again!
customer_reviews.text: An orthopedic doctor recommended this to me. I thought my calves were fine and well stretched until I put my foot on this, then agony (good agony). I literally thought that my calves were going to rip in half, but I held through. After a week or so, the agony subsided. Anytime I get lazy and skip this, I can feel them start to stiffen again. The instructions are a little tough for visual learners and the YouTube videos are equally bad. Otherwise, this works very well. Tip: My doctor wrote a note that this was medically necessary for me due to an injury and I used FSA money to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand specifically because this is the one at my gym and the one my physical therapist has. She told me not to waste my money on a cheaper one. There's something about the specific angle and the way this one is made that is worth the extra money. I highly recommend it. I got it because I have developed plantar fascitis and it is excellent for stretching foot, calf and hamstrings. Wear shoes when using.
customer_reviews.author: April B

customer_reviews.title: Great if you need help with heel spur pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I have a heel spur and I was going to physical therapy for the pain and they had one of these that I used every time I was there it works great for stretching and help a lot after a few visits so I decided to buy one for home . I love it and it’s worth buying it . I give it 5 stars 👍
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Dickson

customer_reviews.title: The best calf stretcher.  Copies don't compare!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best for stretching ones calf. I tried a cheaper copy and it's just not as good. Shoe slips and doesn't fit the heel as well so slides out etc...
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: You need the stretch in your calf (which this provides) to relieve the pain in your feet!
customer_reviews.text: A friend who also had plantar faciits said she'd tried everything and didn't get relief til she used one of these. I went to her physical therapist's office and checked it out. She was absolutely right. This thing is a godsend. I take it everywhere like my wallet or my phone! Sooo glad I found this item I'd have paid lots more if I'd have known how quickly I got relief. It came fast and was only about 30 bucks. This combined with the night splint and life is great! Anytime it flares up I just hop on my prostretch for a few moments and voila. My feet used to feel bruised and painful. This tool is amazing...spread the word!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: My orthopedist recommended the Pro Stretch after examining my severe calf injury... I had to go to PT for a few months, and this device helped with the stretches I was doing at home. Painful as it was, it's extremely helpful. You don't need to have an injury to use it, it's just great for overall stretching!
customer_reviews.author: Mirela B.

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I bought this item for home
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stretcher at the gym for a while and finally decided to buy one for home. It's great and I definitely needthe benefits of this device after my 20 miler this past weekend. Make sure you put the stretcher in front of something to hang on to - a countertop is fine. I have size 7 running shoes and the fit was perfect. I cannot speak about other sizes. I feel this item is much better than stretching my gastrocs by leaning on the wall. Well-worth the purchase for a year-round runner like me.
customer_reviews.author: RDiane

customer_reviews.title: relieves pain and i feel like i'm walking of clouds!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for pain relief for my knees. I feel like i'm walking on clouds!!! i could use this all day. but you need shoes to use it
customer_reviews.author: Corey Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Best Stretching Aid Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING!!! I'm having achilles tendon issues (from taking Levaquin). It gives me a great stretch, and you can slowly easy into a greater stretch. Wish I'd had this years ago when I had plantar fasciatis.
customer_reviews.author: WSDareMe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it works
customer_reviews.text: It works better than stretching I do on my own. And it's very easy to use. I keep this in our bedroom and when walking by use it for 30 seconds. Wish I had discovered this before spending $500 on osteopathic medical treatments that were effective but more costly and less costly.
customer_reviews.author: Stellagirl

customer_reviews.title: Good Stretch
customer_reviews.text: whether you are a runner or not this is a great way to stretch your calf muscles. let's face it we problem don't stretch as much as we all should. This little and simple tool let's you stretch that calf muscle without any effort and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: danraoul

customer_reviews.title: Best Money I Ever Spent
customer_reviews.text: Best $ I ever spent. Been dealing with tight muscles in my calf, ankle and thigh (hamstring) and tried one of these at my gym. Immediately went home and ordered this one. I couldn't wait for it to get here. I've been using everyday since I got it. I've twice now walked personal bests and beat my time on my bike. Wish I had found this about 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: ... knee rehab (eventually had total knee replacement) and I love it. It is a great way to stretch ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these after starting knee rehab (eventually had total knee replacement) and I love it. It is a great way to stretch in the morning. I only recommend using a pad equal to the height of this so you aren't being so lopsided. Fantastic product, great for home rehab.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT for stretching your calf
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT for stretching your calf. Some of the reviews I read before purchasing stated that you could get just as good a stretch if you used a wall: not true at all for me, using this device I can stretch my calf much easier and further. Why did I purchase? Doctor recommended doing more stretching in addition to going through rehab. I bought this device, too, and it has been nothing but great. It's simple, strong, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Simple way to get relief
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and only used it once, but I really like it. I awoke this morning with a severe cramping in my calf and I used this to see if I could relieve the pain and with just a few rocking the pain eased up considerably . Now a few hours later the pain is completely gone. It feels good to use it the stretching is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Terry House

customer_reviews.title: Really good stretch
customer_reviews.text: I run and work out a lot and get calf muscle cramps in the middle of the night. This has helped me really stretch out my calf muscles and I don't get those cramps anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Help
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this device hurt my husband's foot more than helped. Go to your Dr if you have plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: MTMD

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Gives a decent stretch for lower calf and a medium stretch for upper calf. However I wish there was a way to get better stretch with out jave to apply so much weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ragan Sheedy

customer_reviews.title: Seen for years and finally purchased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product (having seen it advertised in catalogs for years) because part of my daily PT includes stretching my calves in a stair step, which eventually damaged my basement step! This tool works much better; is well built; and a real value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Harding

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have MS and foot drop on my left leg so this exceriser is perfect to stretch the back of my legs! My grandson have to go to PT for very tight hamstrings in his legs so I have been having him use it too and he does it willingly because it's mine and he doesn't feel like he has to do it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linna

customer_reviews.title: I experienced a trimaleolar fracture in August 2015. Multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: I experienced a trimaleolar fracture in August 2015. Multiple breaks and fractures! This was used at physical therapy to help regain my movement in my ankle. I purchased it because it was difficult for me to use because of my serious breaks. It has helped to regain my function.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Relief
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product on recommendation from a fellow employee who "diagnosed" my problem. My symptoms abated immediately. This is a simple "gadget" but it works, it will be used, and is well made. The price was competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! When I first saw it, I thought it was a gimmick - after all, can't I just stretch on a step? Cheap device that is very well made and will give your calves a good stretching. I find that with this, I don't have to crunch up my toes to keep from falling off the step, and as an added bonus, if you reach down towards the ground while having your foot in this, you can get a KILLER hamstring stretch! My PT introduced me to it, and boy, am I glad she did!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kam

customer_reviews.title: Helped relieve heel pain
customer_reviews.text: Stretching my heel with this has helped relieve plantar fasciitis pain
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Central TX

customer_reviews.title: Best product for Plantar Fascia by far !
customer_reviews.text: Many Podiatrist will try to sell you very expensive devices for plantar issues but this is by far the best. It is very well made and really stretches the calf muscles to relieve heel pain due to plantar fascia. My heel pain is almost gone now. My doctor did not offer this nor even mention it, but offered much more expensive devices $$$$. Guess they cannot make any profit selling the Prostretch. It packs easy too for travel. GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: nice soleus stretch
customer_reviews.text: works very well. helps with the symptoms of tendonitis. keep in mind, it only works while wearing shoes. it is painful to the heel otherwise. I recommend this product. it stretches the soleus muscle very well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Peterson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I had torn ligaments in my ankle & part of the physical therapy was to stretch my ankle daily.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I had torn ligaments in my ankle & part of the physical therapy was to stretch my ankle daily. This inexpensive product helped me heal my ankle!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L.

customer_reviews.title: It helps with the pain
customer_reviews.text: They began using this in physical therapy for me so I figured may as well have one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: A Physical Therapy Aid
customer_reviews.text: My massage therapist recommended this and it works quite well. I would just caution anyone to be very careful, very mindful, with the amount of stretch you're getting. It's easy to over-do it, especially with your Achilles, which is not good! I always hold onto a countertop or stair rail for extra control. If used properly, it really, really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: prostretch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife who had been using one on load from the physical therapist as part of treatment for plantars facieitis (sp?) - and was working well for her. She also suggested I use it to stretch out before & after being out on my bicycle (16 miles is a typical short ride for me); this has cut down any feeling of pulling a calf muscle when riding on windy days or longer distances. Well worth to have one of these to help stretching out. Shipped quickly as anything else I've ordered through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D.

customer_reviews.title: Hasn’t helped yet
customer_reviews.text: I guess your foot needs too hurt before it gets better still using
customer_reviews.author: Della Funk

customer_reviews.title: Boom!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sturdy, and exactly what I expected after using the one from my PT sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Master Paku

customer_reviews.title: it works good and you can get a good stretch especially when ...
customer_reviews.text: This will last a lifetime and 5 other lifetimes. This is a real rigid piece of plastic that is uncomfortable when you don't wear shoes. Since I don't wear shoes inside my house, I have taken it to work but the point of buying this product was to be able to use it at the comfort at home. Other than that, it works good and you can get a good stretch especially when you hold onto something and lean into it.
customer_reviews.author: youreajaywalker

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described. I was instructed to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. I was instructed to get this from my foot doctor. It really seems to help!
customer_reviews.author: KCD

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on the advice of my physical therapist. Well built, should stand the test of time. Does what is advertised to do. Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Lester D. Bale III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have severe plantar fasciitis and struggle with calf pain and cramps. This is amazing at allowing me to stretch and release my muscles without strain. It has been wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and get excellent calf stretch from this. I love! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia T

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used the pro stretch in physical therapy to reduce the pain of plantar fasciitis. It is easy to use and provides a wonderful stretch for the calf and ankle area. It is sturdy and doesn't take up a lot of space. I use it on a daily basis and find it to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Plantar fasciitis goodbye.
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor told me to order one instead of trying to sell me one. It has helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stretch the feet just the calf.
customer_reviews.text: Although it is sturdy it doesn't stretch my foot just the calf, which was what it was why I purchased this. Would be better off using a curb or step. Complete waste of money for my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: kdw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who likes Cardio/Core workouts understands the importance of properly stretching before you start your workout. My Personal Trainer recommended getting a calf stretcher and the ProStretch is a terrific tool (when used PROPERLY!!!!). Gives a great calf stretch and you can use it to stretch your hamstring and other leg muscles. You don't need to be a body builder or work out animal (because I am certainly neither) to appreciate the benefits of this stretcher.
customer_reviews.author: Strommy

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my bathroom so I can stretch while brushing my teeth. It's such a simple, yet effective tool. I'm finally getting some relief from the pain in my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Senora Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market for plantar fasciitis! The place I went for therapy even used it ! Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cure for heel spurs. The only issue is that you do need to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Exercise to reduce pain & inflammation
customer_reviews.text: Helps to feel like I'm walking on air during my hectic work day.
customer_reviews.author: Pete in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: The best calf stretcher
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It’s super sturdy and made well. It really gives me a nice stretch before and after running on my treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my wife, a runner, suffering from plantar fasciitis. She uses this daily, really likes it. This product seems like it would last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: DJJJS

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must have!
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and my calves are always tight. I used to just put my foot on the base of the wall to stretch and I thought that felt pretty good. After reading the reviews on Amazon, I found this gem. After 1 use, I think I felt a euphoric sensation in my legs and had the ultimate release go energy and flexibility in my legs. This pro stretch is perfect! Def. a must half for tight calves!
customer_reviews.author: Santi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these in physical therapy and it really helped. In case plantar faciitis comes back, I’ll be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Vera K. Orthlieb

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my physical therapist for plantar fasciitis pain relief. Been using it for a month, 3+ times a day, 3 reps of 30 sec stretch, 5 sec relax. And I am starting to feel the difference. Not completely cured yet, but finally I feel like it's going in the right direction. I can walk now with very little discomfort. This device provides a much deeper stretch for the calf muscle and achilles tendon than the traditional stretch against a wall or a slanted board.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: USA Made!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with my purchase. This is the same one used when I go for physical therapy. Easy to use and it is sturdy. It may cost a little more than the others, but it’s made in the United States so I’m helping some people keep their jobs. .
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Schorr

customer_reviews.title: Great device for stretching
customer_reviews.text: Works great for stretching your calf and foot. We have two for convenience - the first one has lasted us years.
customer_reviews.author: DaveS

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years at my gym. Needed one for home works great.
customer_reviews.author: Good

customer_reviews.title: We used a slicone "heel cup" for the heel as it is not comfortable on the heel for use without wearing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well. The design could use a more ergonomic perspective. We used a slicone "heel cup" for the heel as it is not comfortable on the heel for use without wearing shoes. And, it does not work well when you have on shoes. The design is pretty basice, but works for the purpose it was made.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: I have plantar fasciitis so this is great for me
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis so this is great for me. I would wear socks tho when you use it as the back heal portion can sometimes pinch the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Nistico

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Physical Therapist has one of these and I just had to get one. Love, Love, Love it!! I have Plantar Fasciitis and it gives you a great stretch... I can use it to stretch before any exercise and will use it forever! Did I mention that I love this thing?? :)
customer_reviews.author: Hotpink

customer_reviews.title: Prostretch Single is great!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Prostretch at the physical therapy facility for plantar fasciitis. It worked so well in stretching my calf that I had to have one. The PT assistant told me I could get it online so I immediately searched and found it on Amazon. I use the Prostretch daily as part of my at home PT exercises and highly recommend it for anyone with plantar fasciitis or anyone who stands on their feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Stretch your calf
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful in addition to physical therapy. It enabled me to perform the calf stretching exercise more often which ultimately speeded up the healing process.
customer_reviews.author: zels bells

customer_reviews.title: Heal Yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I learned about this wonderful tool at physical therapy. It is helping me recover from knee surgery. However I think I will use it for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t care for it
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of this l. It seemed to bother my knee when I used it
customer_reviews.author: vp

customer_reviews.title: Does not.work
customer_reviews.text: I used this to stretch for my plantar fasciitis I am 100 times worse! This product does not work. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great for fellow fasciitis suffers
customer_reviews.text: This is such a quick and easy tool to use to help alleviate the pain of plantar fasciitis. I use it twice a day for two minutes at a time and have noticed an easing of pressure from my calf muscle. It has helped make my daily walk less painful.
customer_reviews.author: SRS

customer_reviews.title: Best and Easiest Full Calf Stretch
customer_reviews.text: I use this calf stretcher every day. I find it the best of all that i have used. I believe it should prevent future injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Funk

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching
customer_reviews.text: Great to have on hand to keep your calves stretched out. Nothing better than lots of walking all day then getting to use this.
customer_reviews.author: JLEE2047

customer_reviews.title: Good stretch
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use to get a nice full calf stretch. You need to do more stretching than this to keep your calf from being cranky, but it's convenient and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie N.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product nicely packaged. The product is awesome. Sometimes my foot tightens up due to the broken foot I suffered last year and the plantar fasciitis that I have now and I would either sit down and use the Pro-Stretch for several minutes or practice different exercises that I follow from the book that it came with and my foot feels much better than before. I highly recommend getting one. I actually wanted to get the bilateral one but didn't want to spend the money for it. The unilateral one works great when the instructions that came with the product are followed. No regrets! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Boricua

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every single day to stretch my calves.I am on my feet for 10 hrs a day.Been using this product for 15 yrs.I've had a history of stress fractures in my feet so I stretch every day to avoid further injury.THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hagestedt

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to stretch out my calves, easy plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor showed me this stretch that helps me get my calves stretched and helps stretch out the fasciia. I am not sure how it works, but it does. I try to do it regularly to ease the pain. You can probably get the same type of stretch with a wall or some stairs, but this makes it a little easier to get a nice deep stretch. At least for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kang

customer_reviews.title: This gave me the PERFECT stretch, I havent had any problems since
customer_reviews.text: This calf stretcher CHANGED M LIFE. I was running a lot and had all sorts of calf and achilles heel problems. This gave me the PERFECT stretch, I havent had any problems since. I would recommend buying one ASAP
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: and recommended to many
customer_reviews.text: We have at least two and have purchased more for our son and daughter, and recommended to many. If you are a casual runner, or a serious cross fit trainer, it's a must have if you have issues with tight calves. It fits nicely in a guy bag or large purse. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Plantar Fasciitis Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Same items that I used at my PT for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E.

customer_reviews.title: Great stretch!
customer_reviews.text: Really helped with my plantar fasciitis, it's not a permanent fix but really, really helps with the relief and soreness
customer_reviews.author: Jahn Kukla

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping feet and lower legs flexible
customer_reviews.text: Was utilized in physical therapy to help keep my feet and lower leg muscles flexible and had to have at home to continue care at home!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Life changing.
customer_reviews.text: Has helped tremendously with spouse's plantar fasciitis. He has one at work and one at home and uses it 2-3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tohline

customer_reviews.title: Sure helps with Fashia
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the instructions and you will feel relief
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Foos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this stretcher. exactly the one that i was looking for that they have in the health clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Swtpotato

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product I use it every day helps with stretching that I need on my everyday life, since it’s been used for stretching my foot. I have been battling plantar fasciitis for a while and this product it’s just perfect for stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the pro stretch but was disappointed that no shipping paper was included in box with the Pro Stretch nor were there any instructions. It is pretty simple but I have never received product without shipping information or "how to use" instructions. ProStretch does work great.
customer_reviews.author: S W

customer_reviews.title: Effective and efficient. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: By far the most effective and efficient way to stretch my calves that I have found. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Oculus

customer_reviews.title: Good calf stretch
customer_reviews.text: I have used my friends. This is similar but a tad longer. It stretches great but my foot might be a little short for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper122

customer_reviews.title: Good for home use and/or at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the single Medi-Dyne ProStretch to have at home to be able to use prior to going on a long walk in my neighborhood. Our local gym has this stretching system so I was familiar with the product. The product is durable and was shipped in a timely manner. Amazon had the best price on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gal

customer_reviews.title: it was a hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in law whose calves are always very tight. She says it does the job well. She uses it to stretch right before she runs.
customer_reviews.author: RuJa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent and effective stretcher. The included DVD is helpful in getting a complete stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best stretch
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day to get a consistent stretch. Doing work that has me sitting for several hours at a time, I keep this at my desk so I can stand and stretch to keep me limber throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: LK Gardner-Griffie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It works, kinda. It wasnt expensive so I'm okay with trying it out, but I probably wont use it. I also bought a slant board and while it's more expensive, and takes up a little more room it's worth it. I would highly recommend looking at a decent slant board if your thinking about buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I started to stand at my desk rather than sit all day. I really like this but my calves tighten up by the end of the day. I got one of these and keep it under my desk. It really helps to be able to rock on it and keep my calves from tightening up. American made too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff of the North

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I have known about this stretcher for years, and I have recommended this to many of my clients, but just purchased one for myself recently. It has saved not only my calf, but hamstring and lower back from stretching the connective tissue all along the back line. So simple, yet does so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Curing my pain. Never woulda believed it.
customer_reviews.text: This little doohickey is fantastic. I'm in my 30s and have fabulous shoes I haven't been wearing the past few months because of increasing pain in my left heel. The first few times I used this the pain actually was worse for the day, one time so much I wanted to hop around on one foot, but now it's been a week and I have SIGNIFICANT improvement in my pain. I'm even eyeing my red heels again. A few more weeks and I should be ready to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: La Flower Lady

customer_reviews.title: Stretching never felt so good.
customer_reviews.text: After going to PT, I love this device. My Achilles tendon feels much better using this. It's exactly like the one my therapist uses in his practice.
customer_reviews.author: Tidbit

customer_reviews.title: Simple effective device!
customer_reviews.text: Believe all the 5 star ratings. It’s a very inexpensive and easy way to treat foot pain! I wish I’d have found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: abookworm

product_meta.title: ProStretch "Blue" - The Original Calf Stretcher & Foot Rocker for Plantar Fasciitis, Achilles Tendonitis & Tight Calf Pain (Slip Resistant Bottom)
product_meta.description:
For over 20 years, ProStretch has been the favorite of professional athletes, athletic trainers, & Physical Therapists worldwide. They have recognized that ProStretch helps reduce the risk of injury when used before & after exercise. That's why you'll find ProStretch on the sidelines of professional and collegiate level sporting events & in Physical Therapy clinics worldwide. 

 The ProStretch "Blue" rocker design automatically holds the foot in the optimal position for proper stretching, providing a biomechanically accurate & efficient stretch that's been proven to work the lower leg muscles more effectively than conventional methods 

 ProStretch Provides Relief For 

 * Heel Pain 
 * Shin Splints 
 * Achilles Tendonitis 
 * Inflexibility 
 * Plantar Fasciitis 
 * Strained Calf 
 * Ankle Strength 

 Safety, control, compliance, effectiveness, & efficiency were taken into consideration when designing this stretching device. 

 Fits adult shoes up to size 13. Recommended weight limit is 250lbs. 

 CAUTION: Please be aware that the only authorized sellers for this product on Amazon.com are Preferred Pro-Formance Products, Therapy Connection, Ithaca Sports, and Arx Medical. Please call this number if you have any questions about this product - (817) 865-1207. For returns, please contact the seller directly.
feature_bullets: MEDICALLY PROVEN - ProStretch is medically proven to provide a deeper & more effective stretch than conventional methods such as floor or curb stretching
PREVENTS & TREATS COMMON LOWER LEG AILMENTS - Using ProStretch daily reduces pain caused by Heel Pain, Plantar Fasciitis, Achilles Tendonitis, Sever’s Disease, Shin Splints, Tight Calves & Hamstrings
SLIP RESISTANT BOTTOM - Advanced rubber strips on bottom of ProStretch protect against moving & sliding, allowing for a safe & effective stretch
